summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 FORD FOCUS. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE POWER STEERING FAILED AND THE VEHICLE BECAME DIFFICULT TO STEER WHILE DRIVING. THERE WAS NO WARNING LIGHT ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO CROSSROADS FORD OF DUNN BENSON (1700 W. CUMBERLAND ST, DUNN, NC 28334), AND WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE POWER STEERING CONTROL MODULE (PSCM) NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 168,000.
